description.value:
Aspect air

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect A spark flashes out from the relic toward a creature within 20 feet. This spark deals @Damage[1d12[electricity]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save). The damage increases by 1d12 at 6th level and by another 1d12 every 4 levels thereafter.

[[/r (1+max(0,floor((@actor.level -2)/4)))d12[electricity]]]{Leveled electricity damage}
